Centre of Expertise RDM

Home page for Projects at Centre of Expertise RDM
from the Rotterdam University of Applied Science

Welcome to the Centre of Expertise RDM.

CoE RDM aims to become an information hub on maritime technology and mainport innovation. This website is hosted by the research unit "Mainport Information", and focuses on the role of IT, embedded and mobile tech in the maritime sector. Our current projects include

- Hydrophonics: under water audio 
- Aquatic drones: automatic vessels and submersibles (a.k.a 'wet robots')
- sensor grids: intelligent cooperative sensors
- augmented reality: for maritime e-learning

Check out the projects on the respective pages!

Contact us!

For more info, check out the homepage at http://kenniscentrumrdm.hr.nl/
